Unusual data volume or flow direction ob.Data: Zeek conn.log, Zeek smtp.log, Zeek pop3.log, Zeek imap.log
Unusual data volume or flow direction ob.Action: Analyze Zeek smtp.log, pop3.log, imap.log for sessions where the client sends significantly more data than the server receives (e.g., using descriptive statistics or ratios on 'orig_bytes' and 'resp_bytes' fields). Flag sessions exceeding a defined threshold or percentile.

Network traffic using mail protocols ori.Data: Zeek conn.log, Zeek smtp.log, Zeek pop3.log, Zeek imap.log, Windows Event ID 4688
Network traffic using mail protocols ori.Action: Correlate network sessions using mail protocols (Zeek conn.log, smtp.log, pop3.log, imap.log) with host process creation logs (Windows Event ID 4688) to identify processes initiating mail protocol connections that are not standard mail clients. Analyze packet contents (if available in logs, or require deeper inspection) for anomalies or non-standard formatting that indicates data concealment, potentially using entropy measures to identify high-entropy data within expected cleartext fields.
